install.name: Widgetkit Twitter
install.author: YOOtheme
install.description: Twitter module for Widgetkit developed by YOOtheme (http://www.yootheme.com)

param.name: from_user
param.label: From User(s)
param.description: Display tweets from one user or more users (Separate with spaces)

param.name: to_user
param.label: To User(s)
param.description: Display tweets to one user or more users (Separate with spaces)

param.name: ref_user
param.label: Referencing User(s)
param.description: Display tweets referencing one user or more users (Separate with spaces)

param.name: nots
param.label: Not with Word
param.description: These words will be filtered from search (Separate with spaces)

param.name: limit
param.label: Limit
param.description: Limit number of tweets to display

param.name: show_image
param.label: Image
param.description: Show/Hide the image of the Twitter user

param.name: show_date
param.label: Publish Date
param.description: Show/Hide the publish date of the tweets
